docs.lead_paragraph: IN a large barred packing box in the 'tween deck section of the Hamburg-American line freighter Christiania, now pounding her way to Hamburg through the North Atlantic turmoil, are confined two friends -- King James, a royal Bengal tiger, and Spud, little Spud, the homeliest, "orneriest" bunch of yellow mongrel hair and snapping black eyes that ever traveled on a ferryboat.

headline.main: Captivity Makes Queer Friendships Animals; True Story of Spud the Yellow Dog and King James the Royal Bengal Tiger --- Most Human Affection Existing Between Tommy the Little Grey Monkey and Buldo the Big Baboon.
